Texts.Eng:
A race of shy radioactive beings with a disputed origin. This species is intended for Survival or Hardcore modes and ^red;*requires*^reset; Will recieve 50% reduced benefits without Hunger enabled. ^red;Challenge is high^reset;.
 
 Diet: Any, including prepared Isotopes.
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 +^green;10^reset;% Energy
 Resist: ^green;40^reset;% Radiation, 10% Ice & Electric, 7% Cosmic
 Tech: Seed Bulb
 Immune: Radiation Burn
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 On ^green;Radioactive^reset; biomes :+^green;15^reset;% Dmg and En Regen, - Hunger
 On ^red;Hot^reset; biomes:-^red;15^reset;% Protection, increased Hunger.
 Protection increases over time
 ^cyan;Racial Tech is integral to success^reset;.
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:    
 X'i Weapons: +^green;1^reset;% Crit and +^green;14^reset;% Protection
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 ^red;High Hunger Rate^reset;,-^red;10^reset;% Health
 -^red;25^reset;% Fire, -^red;10^reset;% Shadow. ^red;Worsens with hunger^reset;.
 ^red;CAN NOT^reset; use Healing items. Must use racial heals.
